# Without lines.

This is a paragraph
    and this is further text

This is a paragraph
   and this is further text

This is a paragraph with some asterisks
    ***

This is a paragraph followed by a horizontal rule
   ***

# With lines.

This is a paragraph

    and this is code

This is a paragraph

   and this is a new paragraph

This is a paragraph with some asterisks in a code block

    ***

This is a paragraph followed by a horizontal rule

   ***
